comments:
Build:  TPTP-4.3.0-200609200100

- File > Import > Profiling and Logging > Log File > Add
- Select apache access log file > specify the path of the log file attached
- Switch to the Filter tab > New > Check "Filter by events" > Select "last" to display the last 10 events.
- Click OK
- Click OK > Finish

An error dialog appears and the following exception is logged:

org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.LogParserException: IWAT0412E Errors occurred parsing the log file C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\workspaces\test-pass\org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.tests\gui\Common.Resources\apache-access.log.
at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.importer.ParserWrapper.parse(ParserWrapper.java:144)
at org.eclipse.hyades.logging.parsers.internal.importer.LocalLogImportLoader.startParsing(LocalLogImportLoader.java:95)
at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.log.internal.core.LocalImportHandler.importLog(LocalImportHandler.java:85)
at org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.logui.internal.wizards.ImportLogWizard$MyLocalLogImportJob.run(ImportLogWizard.java:968)
at org.eclipse.core.internal.jobs.Worker.run(Worker.java:58)
Ali, Can you confirm that the log is imported succesfully after the error is shown?
yes, the log file is imported successfully despite the error message.  I'm lowering the severity to major.

I have gotten the same error but the log file does not import correctly. The error log is identical to the one above and I am using a Filter and file from Trace.UI.Filters test suite, test name Filters Import_Log2.

I also got this error importing the same log file for another test case but the import succeeded. The only difference in the two imports was the filters. The filter causing the failure also used the last/events filter as part of it so it could be a problem with that particular filter type.
Seems to work fine in the TPTP-4.3.0-200610100100 driver.  Please reopen the defect if you experience this problem again.

traces.message: IWAT0412E Errors occurred parsing the log file C:\Documents and Settings\Administrator\workspaces\test-pass\org.eclipse.tptp.monitoring.tests\gui\Common.Resources\apache-access.log.
